<xs:schema version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="account" type="account"/> <xs:element name="audit" type="audit"/> <xs:element name="incident" type="incident"/> <xs:element name="incidentStatistics" type="incidentStatistics"/> <xs:complexType name="audit"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creatorId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="created" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="status" type="status" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="previousStatus" type="status" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:attribute name="incidentId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="incidentStatistics"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="byStatus" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="count" type="byStatus" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="createdToday" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="all" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="byStatus"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="status" type="status"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="account"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="phone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="role" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="incident"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creatorId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="incidentType" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="address" type="address" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="created" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="status" type="status" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="assigneeId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="addressLine" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="cityLine" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="CONFIRMED"/> <xs:enumeration value="NOT_CONFIRMED"/> <xs:enumeration value="SOLVED"/> <xs:enumeration value="CLOSED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

con:config.script:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils
String charset = (('A'..'Z') + ('0'..'9')).join()
Integer length = 9
String randomString = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray())
String incidentTypeRandom = "Incident Type " + randomString
String incidentDescriptionRandom = "Incident Description " + randomString
random = new Random()
int randomInt = random.nextInt(3)+1
// set properties
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "type" , "Incident Type: " + randomString)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "description" , "Incident Description: " + randomString)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "userId" , randomInt + "")

con:testCase.name: Get all incidents - invalid string status
Get all incidents - notexisting string status
Get all incidents - invalid numerical status
Get all incidents - too long status
